hero.title: The First Digital Platform For Road Freight In Syria
hero.text: The smart solution for managing and facilitating road freight operations. Whether you are a carrier or a shipper, we guarantee you an unparalleled safe and easy experience.

shippers.title: Your digital partner in land freight, full control from start to delivery.
shippers.text: Be part of the future of smart shipping – join camion now!

truck-size.title: Learn about various truck options and dimensions to precisely match your shipping needs.

about.title: CAMION is one of the solutions offered by Across Mena Logistics LLC for trade logistics and international shipping.
about.desc: The company is continually working on enhancing its services through information technology and by leveraging the latest techniques and methods to digitalize logistics operations.
about.visionText: To Bring About A Significant Shift In The World Of Land Freight By Offering Innovative, Safe, And Efficient Solutions That Meet The Ever-Evolving Market Demands.
about.missionText: To Provide Reliable And Sustainable Transportation Services, With A Focus On Enhancing The Customer Experience Through Innovation And The Use Of Cutting-Edge Technology.
about.goalsText: To Build A Flexible Land Freight System That Swiftly Adapts To The Needs Of The Market And Customers, Thereby Promoting Operational Sustainability And Enhancing Service Excellence.

camionServices.title: CAMION
camionServices.subtitle: Services
camionServices.description: Join the world of smart shipping and start your journey with us towards smoother and more professional logistics
camionServices.service1_title: Track Every Shipment in Real Time
camionServices.service1_desc: Direct visibility of truck movement in real-time throughout its journey
camionServices.service2_desc: Instant bookings with a few clicks, easy shipment management, and reduced manual tasks.
camionServices.service3_desc: Intuitive interfaces for quick access to all services.
camionServices.service4_desc: Enhanced truck efficiency to reduce carbon footprint.

whyCamion.shippers_2: Track shipments on the map in real-time.

camionInNumbers.stat2_text: Reducing the percentage of empty flights

camionDownload.description: The power of land freight at your fingertips. Get a comprehensive shipping experience in one app. Available now on the App Store and Google Play.

camionTracking.title: Real-time Tracking
camionTracking.paragraph1: CAMION offers an advanced tracking system that allows shippers and carriers to monitor their shipments moment by moment, providing a high level of transparency and control.
camionTracking.paragraph2: With real-time tracking, you can receive accurate updates on the truck's location and estimated arrival times, helping you plan effectively and avoid delays.

greenLogistics.title: Green Logistics with CAMION
greenLogistics.paragraph: CAMION contributes to enhancing efficiency and reducing carbon emissions, making it the ideal choice for companies aiming for sustainability.
greenLogistics.feature1_desc: Selecting the most efficient routes to reduce distances and time, thereby minimizing the carbon footprint.
greenLogistics.feature2_desc: An intelligent system that matches trucks to minimize empty trips, thereby reducing fuel consumption and carbon emissions.
greenLogistics.feature3_desc: Providing shippers with instant data on their carbon footprint for each shipment to enhance sustainable shipping strategies.

whyChooseCamion.title: Why Choose Camion
whyChooseCamion.subtitle: Make your shipment smarter and smoother with CAMION.
whyChooseCamion.item1: User-friendly interface for easy shipment management.
whyChooseCamion.item2: Instant quotes and bookings for suitable trucks.
whyChooseCamion.item3: Full control from dispatch to final delivery.
whyChooseCamion.item6: Comprehensive digital record for all operations, accessible anytime.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.subtitle: Start now and experience a smooth, innovative shipping experience with CAMION!

steps.step1_title: Create a Shipment and Define Its Route
steps.step1_desc: Enter shipment details and define its route with ease.
steps.step2_desc: CAMION provides various truck sizes to fit your needs.
steps.step3_desc: Monitor your shipment in real time with full visibility.

truckTypes.title: Truck Types
truckTypes.subtitle: Explore All the Truck Types You Need

camionOffersCarriers.title: What does “Camion” offer carriers?
camionOffersCarriers.service1_desc: Direct visibility of truck movement in real-time throughout its journey.
camionOffersCarriers.service2_desc: Search and book available loads quickly via a user-friendly interface.
camionOffersCarriers.service3_title: Real-time tracking for all your trucks:
camionOffersCarriers.service3_desc: Monitor your truck's locations live to enhance visibility and control.
camionOffersCarriers.service4_title: Regular updates on your truck’s status:
camionOffersCarriers.service4_desc: Receive comprehensive reports on your trucks’ performance, including speed, maintenance, and fuel consumption.

howToGetStarted.title: How to get started with Camion
howToGetStarted.subtitle: Start now and experience a smooth, innovative shipping experience with CAMION.
howToGetStarted.step1_desc: Create your account and gain access to hundreds of available loads.
howToGetStarted.step2_desc: Enter your truck’s specifications so you can match with the right loads.
howToGetStarted.step3_desc: Find loads that fit your truck and book them instantly.
howToGetStarted.step4_desc: Track your truck live and enjoy a smooth and efficient experience.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Feel free to contact us for any inquiries. Our team is ready to support your logistics needs efficiently and professionally.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.subtitle: Have questions? We’re just a message away
